entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
